content: the bag are worked in a continuous spiral from the base then each side of the bag is shaped with a few short row see the tutorial photos below handles are worked in rounds from the sides of the bag use the larger hook for the bottom of the bag then switch to the smaller hook for the sides of the bag and handles switch from the main color yarn to the contrast color yarn after round 21 noted in the pattern below maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful bottom with mc and larger hook chain 2 round 1 8 half_double_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook 8 sts round 2 2 half_double_crochet in each st 16 sts round 3 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st 8 times 24 sts round 4 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 2 sts 8 times 32 sts round 5 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 3 sts 8 times 40 sts round 6 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 4 sts 8 times 48 sts round 7 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 5 sts 8 times 56 sts round 8 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 6 sts 8 times 64 sts round 9 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 7 sts 8 times 72 sts round 10 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 8 sts 8 times 80 sts round 11 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 9 sts 8 times 88 sts round 12 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 10 sts 8 times 96 sts round 13 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 11 sts 8 times 104 sts round 14 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 12 sts 8 times 112 sts round 15 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 13 sts 8 times 120 sts round 16 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 14 sts 8 times 128 sts do not fasten_off sides round 17 with smaller hook slip_stitch to next st chain 6 skip next 3 sts single_crochet in next st 31 times chain 6 skip last 3 sts 31 chain-6 spaces made round 18 single_crochet in 1st chain-6 space from previous round chain 6 skip single_crochet single_crochet in chain-6 space 31 times chain 6 31 chain-6 spaces made there is a photo on the next page to show how round 18 should look rounds 19-21 repeat round 18 fasten_off mc yarn and attach cc yarn with a slip stitch round 17 rounds 22-29 with cc repeat round 18 maui market bag crochet pattern © 2021 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful the start of round 18 add a stitch marker in the last chain 6 space of round 29 a safety pin makes a great stitch marker place a stitch marker in the last chain-6 space of round 29
